body.directions: Listen to the audio, and then complete the multiple-choice questions that follow.

body.textVersion: Audio for 跑步 pǎobù (to run/to jog)

body.quiz: Which of the following words indicate an activity similar in physical requirement as the one indicated by the word in the audio?
body.answer: Audio for 游泳 yóuyǒng (to swim)
options: Audio for 购物 gòuwù(to go shopping )
Audio for 拍照 pāizhào (to take pictures)
Audio for 独处 dúchǔ (to spend time alone )
body.correct: Excellently done! 跑步 pǎobù means “to run/to jog.” It’s a physical workout and of the activities in the choices, 游泳 yóuyǒng (to swim) is also a physical exercise or workout.
body.incorrect: Very close. Listen to the word again to identify its meaning and consider the nature of the activity it indicates. Then review the activities in the choices to see which one shares the same physical characteristic.

body.textVersion: Audio for 运动 yùndòng (to exercise; fitness/sports)

body.quiz: Which of the following sentences can be best completed with the word presented?
options: 她在冬天穿_____。Tā zài dōngtiān chuān_____.
你要去卧室叠_____。Nǐ yào qù wòshì dié _____.
他要去超市买_____。Tā yàoqù chāoshì mǎi _____.
body.correct: Very nicely done! 运动 yùndòng means “to exercise/fitness/sports,” and it can fit well in the sentence 我姐姐喜欢运动。 Wǒ jiějie xǐhuān yùndòng.(My older sister likes to exercise.)
body.incorrect: Not quite. Listen to the word again to identify its meaning. Then, insert it in each of the sentences in the choices to see which one fits the best, both in meaning and in structure

body.textVersion: Audio for 打乒乓球 dǎ pīngpāngqiú (to play pingpong)

body.quiz: Which bold type character in the following words contain the same final as the fourth character in the word in audio?
body.correct: Excellently done! The fourth character in 打乒乓球 dǎ pīngpāngqiú (to play pingpong) has the final “iu,” which is also in the first character, 休 xiū, in the word 休闲活动 xiūxiánhuódòng(pastime).
body.incorrect: Not quite. Listen to the word again to identify the final in its fourth character. Then, sound out the bold type characters in the choices to see which one has the same final.

body.quiz: In what situation will the word in the audio be needed?
body.correct: Outstanding job! 吗 ma is a question particle, and it is placed at the end of a sentence to indicate a question. Later in this lesson, you will learn more about it.
body.incorrect: Oops…Listen to the audio one more time to identify the function of the word. Consider what type of speech it indicates, and check which of the choices suits the best.
